channel.title: Remote on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Remote on TLDRBins

item.title: evil-winrm
item.description: Connect by password evil-winrm -i <TARGET> -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> Connect by hash evil-winrm -i <TARGET> -u <USER> -H <HASH> Connect by kerberos sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && evil-winrm -i <TARGET> -r <DOMAIN> Connect by .crt and .key evil-winrm -i <TARGET> -S -k auth.key -c auth.crt
